mapper.insert: insert into banner_table(banner_type, banner_url, title, text, top_text, bottom_text, details_text, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{bannerType},#{bannerUrl},#{title},#{text},#{topText},#{bottomText},#{detailsText},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.update: update banner_table set banner_type = #{bannerType}, banner_url = #{bannerUrl}, title = #{title}, text = #{text}, top_text = #{topText}, bottom_text = #{bottomText}, details_text = #{detailsText}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
